article_title: The Most Affordable Private Medical Schools
article_text:
Greg Kelly

Columnist

Greg Kelly, the son and grandson of medical doctors, writes on the financial knowledge he's gleaned from physicians in his personal life and from while he was the editor of Physician's Money Digest from 1994-2005.

article_metadata.description: With Medical School "Match Day" upon us, it's a good time to consider medical degree affordability. These 10 schools offer a private medical education at a relatively low cost.

og.title: The Most Affordable Private Medical Schools

article_metadata.keywords: Columns, Personal Finance, Money, Student Debt, Medical School,
